Title: Relates to the reimbursement of local services provided to persons with a disability
Summary: Relates to the reimbursement of local services provided to persons with a disability; provides for retroactive reimbursement if local services were furnished prior to approval.
LawCode: Add ยง43.13, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to reimbursement of certain programs and services for persons with a disability
